channel.title: Blog on Dane Hager's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Dane Hager's Blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: Is this where I put my blog stuff? Testing this out… What happens if I type some code using a tick: ’library(tidyverse) ’library(dslabs) ’data(gapminder) ’countries <- c(“United States”, “Canada”) #creates an easier way to manage filtering by a set of selections ’labels <- data.frame(country=countries, x=c(2010, 2000), y=c(77,80.5)) #x and y variables tell where to put each label ’gapminder %>% filter(country %in% countries) %>% ’ggplot(aes(year, life_expectancy, col=country))+ ’geom_line() + ’geom_text(data=labels, aes(x, y, label=country), size=5) + ’theme(legend.
